title.narrative: Number of sectors integrated into CMDA's geo-spatial information system for improved land use planning
Proportion of identified stakeholders included in consultations for preparation of third Master Plan for Chennai
Share of rental housing as a percentage of TNSF portfolio
Number of units developed through a public-private market solution
Core sectors whose citywide analytics feed into the land use planning process of CMDA
Proportion of new TNSCB housing projects that adopt new operation and maintenance mechanism
Proportion of TNSCB housing projects developed responding to a comprehensive demand assessment and transparent targeting mechanism
Proportion of households benefiting from public support that are screened through an affordability tool
Number of housing development transactions supported by the TNSF
Proportion of housing projects under TNSF that receive green certification
Additional external finance leveraged in TNSF transactions (debt and developer equity) (in millions)
Proportion of at-risk households participating in citizen consultations and livelihood related activities as per the new social sustainability framework of TNSCB dis-aggregated by gender
Proportion of TNSCB’s EWS/LIG housing projects adopting the sustainability frameworks’
Proportion of EWS/LIG beneficiaries receiving government support that are Female Headed Households
Proportion of households where TNSCB undertakes livelihood related activities for females
Proportion of TNSCB housing projects that are gender audited
